title: Change 401(k) Contribution Rate
description: An employee wants to increase their 401(k) contribution percentage.

tasks.description: Direct the employee to the 401(k) provider's website to make the change.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent explains that contribution changes must be made directly with the vendor.

tasks.description: Explain that the change will be reflected in the next 1-2 pay cycles after the provider notifies the company's payroll system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets correct expectations about the timing of the change.
